rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows.
An expansive living room featuring elegant Chettinad elements and a central hearth area, enhanced by abundant natural light.

An open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring modern appliances and a layout aligned with Vastu principles for auspicious energy flow.
A service area including storage, pantry, and utilities.
